GSD.description:
xtensa: Fix refcount leak bug in time.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit 0dcc1dd8a5dd9240639f1051dfaa2dffc9fbbde5. For more details please see the references link.
